definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: Both terminals of zinc containing photoreceptors and dendrites of bipolar cells usually extend into zinc staining areas in OPL.
sentences.chinese: 含鋅光感受器和雙極細胞的突起伸入外網層。
直接作用於外周化學感受器。

sentences.english: These drugs affectstructures in the brain called GABA receptors.
sentences.chinese: 這些藥影響腦中一種叫做GABA感受器的結構。

sentences.english: Segments of photoreceptor connected with outer nuclear layer via the external limiting membrane.
sentences.chinese: 光感受器節段通過外界膜與外核層發生聯繫。

sentences.english: When blood pressure rises, the baroreceptors send messages to the brain.
sentences.chinese: 當血壓上升時，壓力感受器向大腦發送信號。

sentences.english: The opposite happens when the baroreceptors and brain detect low blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 當壓力感受器和大腦發現低血壓時，相反的發生。

sentences.english: As a result, the surface of the egg is covered with the mosquito odorant receptors.
sentences.chinese: 結果青蛙卵的表面被佈滿了蚊子的嗅覺感受器。

sentences.english: The device works with the body's baroreceptors.
sentences.chinese: 該裝置與機體的壓力感受器一起工作。

sentences.english: Stage 1B: Lateral spread of retinal receptors, yellow ring.
sentences.chinese: 視網膜光感受器放射狀伸展，形成黃色環狀。

sentences.english: The cell bodies of the photoreceptors in retina of carp were also stained by zinc.
sentences.chinese: 鱘魚視網膜的部分光感受器胞體鋅離子染色陽性。

sentences.english: Accordingly, these receptors are termed chemoreceptors.
sentences.chinese: 因此，這些感受器被歸爲化學感受器。

sentences.english: Accordingly, these receptors are termed chemoreceptors.
sentences.chinese: 因此，這些感受器被歸爲化學感受器。

sentences.english: Mice, and humans, have three types of light-detecting receptor in the eye.
sentences.chinese: 老鼠和人類的眼睛都有三種可以感光的感受器。

sentences.english: Using a fluorescing process we then capture an image of those dots and we can send that image back to Earth.
sentences.chinese: 這些分子就像小斑點一樣被粘在感受器的表面。

sentences.english: The team estimates that the kakapo has 667 functional olfactory receptor genes.
sentences.chinese: 據估計鴞鵡有667個起作用的嗅覺感受器。

sentences.english: The hair-like vibrative receptor of the cockroach cercus is controlled by the centrifugal nerve fibers.
sentences.chinese: 蜚蠊尾鬚毛形振動感受器受離心神經纖維控制。

definition: afferent nerve (transmitting in to the brain)/afferent neuron
efferent nerve (transmitting out from the brain)/efferent neuron/motor nerve

pinyin: zhong1 shu1 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3
